page.title: 16WHERE PEOPLE LIVE IN CONNEL
page.content: While there are many old houses built mainly of granite there are also modern homes.While many of the houses are privately owned there are also council houses. There are around 253 houses in the area,some of which are bungalows while others are of the villa type.While the council houses are semi_detached most of the private houses are detached.A private housing development of luxury type homes is going ahead on the south side of Connel Bridge.In North Connel there is a modern private housing development on one side of the Loch Nell Arms Hotel while on the other side is a council estate.
